pullrequest.title: Model submission for X1 sensor configuration 1 from Team Explorer

content.raw:
Thank you. Would it be easy to change this lidar to 100m range for consistency with the other “medium” ones in X1-X4?  
Also recommend keeping these documentation pages up to date with new robot configs:  
[#!/osrf/subt/wiki/robots](#!/osrf/subt/wiki/robots)  
[#!/osrf/subt/wiki/api](#!/osrf/subt/wiki/api)
